ser_settings_t Struct Reference

This structure defines the Serial Port configurationsettings.

Data Fields

  • unsigned short baudrate
  • unsigned char format
  • unsigned char rxthreshold

Field Documentation

unsigned short ser_settings_t::baudrate

Baud rate divisor.

unsigned char ser_settings_t::format

Word format. This must be set to one of the SER_FORMATS values. The format defines the number of data bits, number of stop bits and parity type for the transaction.

unsigned char ser_settings_t::rxthreshold

Receive FIFO trigger threshold. This must be set to one of the SER_RXTHRESHOLDS values

The documentation for this struct was generated from the following file:
